thread.section_title: Clothoo - Varsity Jackets Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Clothoo - Varsity Jackets | clothoo.com
thread.title: Luis Bravo
thread.title_full: Clothoo - Varsity Jackets reviewed by Luis Bravo

author: Luis Bravo
title: Luis Bravo
text: Barber from the Philly area. First time ordering with them & from a small business owner perspective. My entire experience with Clothoo, was sufficient and very satisfactory. From communicating to the recieving of my order.... everything went smoothly. I will definitely be ordering again in the future, & recommending it for any business or personal needs. A big thank you to Waseen!
